recent_publications.title: Fractured tracheostomy tube as a foreign body in a pediatric patient: a case report and review of literature
recent_publications.citation: Journal of Surgical Case Reports 2025 (4), rjaf194
recent_publications.abstract: A case report detailing the rare occurrence of a fractured tracheostomy tube acting as a foreign body in a pediatric patient, including diagnostic and management strategies.

recent_publications.title: Nasal Dermoid Cyst with Sinus Tract Intranasal Bone: A Case Report
recent_publications.citation: International Journal of Otolaryngology and Head & Neck Surgery 13 (NO.2)
recent_publications.abstract: A detailed case report of a rare presentation of nasal dermoid cyst extending into the intranasal bone, highlighting diagnostic challenges and surgical management strategies.

recent_publications.title: Association of fine-needle aspiration of thyroid nodules with final histopathology in diagnosing thyroid malignancy: a single institute retrospective study
recent_publications.abstract: Retrospective study evaluating the accuracy of fine-needle aspiration cytology in diagnosing thyroid malignancy compared to final histopathology results at a single medical center.

recent_publications.title: To Give or Not to Give? Prescribing Antibiotics to the Tonsillectomy Patients in a Tertiary Care Setting
recent_publications.abstract: This study investigates the antibiotic prescribing patterns for tonsillectomy patients in a tertiary care setting, aiming to promote antibiotic stewardship.
